title: Activate Spellcasting
description: Allows the character to begin studying schools of spellcasting. To learn spells, pick and invest in one or more such schools.

title: Backstabber
description: Allows the character to perform Backstab Attacks against voulnerable targets.

title: Evasive
description: Disengaging from Melee does not cause your turn to end.

title: Fancy Footwork
description: Swapping Places with allies not longer causes your Turn to end.

title: Fletching
description: Doubles the chance of recovering a spent arrow after combat.

title: Increased Strength
description: You are powerfully built. +1 to Strength Primary Attribute.

title: Phalanx
description: While wielding a shield, get a dodge bonus for adjacent allies. Bonus is +1 per ally up to a maximum of the Phalanx Bonus attribute value (typically 2).

title: Point Blank Shot
description: You can use Ranged Weapons even when in Melee.
